items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A romantic, size-inclusive choice for special occasions
items.body: The PITINAN Womens Lace Babydoll is an elegant piece of lingerie designed to combine comfort with a classic, romantic aesthetic. This open-front chemise features a delicate lace bodice and a sheer mesh skirt, providing a flattering "fly-away" effect that drapes beautifully over the body. It is specifically noted for its size-inclusive range (S-3XL), ensuring a comfortable fit for various body types, including the XX-Large size you mentioned. The adjustable shoulder straps allow for a customized lift and fit, while the soft, breathable mesh fabric ensures it feels lightweight against the skin. Whether for a wedding night, anniversary, or a personal style choice, this white negligee offers a timeless look with a touch of modern allure. Key Features: Open Front Design: Features a stylish "fly-away" front that adds movement and flair. Intricate Lace Detailing: The floral lace bodice provides a sophisticated and feminine look. Breathable Mesh Fabric: Made from soft, skin-friendly material for all-night comfort. Adjustable Straps: Helps you achieve the perfect fit and support for your silhouette. Bottom line: This is a versatile and affordable choice for anyone seeking a delicate, flattering silhouette. Its combination of lace and mesh makes it a staple for a romantic wardrobe. Read more
items.author: Ruslan Norovyatkin

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good, but for small boobs only.
items.body: This is a really comfortable set. I love that it comes with lace cheeky underwear instead of the standard string thong that most lingerie comes with. It has a standard, plastic snap clip in the front and the rest is open. I am 5'2" and 140 lbs. I got a large and the fit around my rib cage is great, however, it's a bit longer than I would like. That's probably just because I am quite short. The only real problem with this is that the top is for women with small breasts. I have about 36C bust and I was spilling out of the front and sides of this. Busty friends, beware. The color is beautiful and the mesh & lace materials are soft on the skin. Read more
items.author: Kate

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredible set!
items.body: I love love love this set! The fit is absolutely perfect and the feel is amazing. The lace is quality made and feels great against your skin. The open middle is hot because you can play a little peekaboo with your significant other. The white is crisp and clean and looks amazing against my fair skin. A big plus about this outfit is that this comes with a cheeky panty instead of the usual string thong most of these sets come with. I highly suggest this outfit. Read more
items.author: Bang Bang Pineapple Gang

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really pretty AND comfortable!
items.body: The fit and style on this are wonderful! It's comfortable and beautiful, an unusual combination for nightwear! The front clasp feature is very nice, especially if you don't like pulling things over your head! Read more
items.author: Michael C. Hardy

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s beautiful visually but unrealistic for large chested girl
items.body: This lingerie set is very pretty. The red is incredibly vibrant. That being said it is definitely not large chest friendly. I ordered a large size and while it fit the bottom, the top was very unsupportive. Of course, this doesn’t claim to be a underwire bra or anything, but essentially the unclosed feature becomes unusable because it’s just not supportive. I also don’t think the quality of it is that great visually it looks beautiful, but the quality is pretty cheap. Read more
items.author: JB

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bright Bold and Sexy
items.body: Im in between a medium and large at the moment. I ordered a large and I'm glad I did. The top part is very small and the girls are out! If I had went with medium it wouldn't be able to hold in my bust at all. This lingerie nicely skims over my tummy so it's a great option for a night when I'm feeling more bloated that usual. The fabric is soft and the underwear matches nicely to the cut of the nightie. The red is bold and sexy. I felt confident in it since my stomach is not an issue in this lingerie. I'd recommend going with a size up if in between sizes, not for the waist, but for the bust. Read more
items.author: Macaron Girl

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars It’s a good value but I don’t like the middle clasp
items.body: This has some good and some not so good features! I used the size chart provided and probably should have sized down. There is not much support on top. Also the middle clasp is a very cheap looking clear front closure. I expected it to be black (or a color matching the fabric) but it sticks out not in a good way. The fabric itself is soft and not scratchy and the style is flattering! I’m 5’4” and love the length, it lands as shown on the model. I love the undies that come with it too, it’s not an v-string (I hate those) but offers a little more of a cheeky style of thong with nice lace detail. All things considered, it’s a really good price and nicer than many things in a similar price range. Read more
items.author: Alyth

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made lingerie
items.body: Super cute flyaway babydoll outfit. It’s very well made, with nice stitching and no loose threads. The material is light weight, but good quality. I don’t know how to describe it - of course it is a thin and light material, but not as thin and light as you get with the cheap low quality stuff. The lace is very intricate. There is a lot of detail in this. The hubby loves it! Read more
items.author: Carmina G

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, White, Black, Navy Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
